junior.job_path_description: This track is designed for developers aiming to specialize in Linux kernel development, covering kernel internals, device drivers, security, debugging, and embedded systems to prepare for a Linux Kernel Developer role.
junior.title: Linux Kernel Developer

medior.job_path_description: This track is designed for those who already have Linux experience and want to dive deeper into system operations and become a Linux Kernel Engineer.
medior.title: Linux Kernel Engineer

senior.job_path_description: This track is designed for those who already have Linux experience and want to dive deeper into system operations and become a Linux Kernel Engineer.
senior.title: Embedded Linux Development Engineer
